ul.li: Maintain blood pressure below 130/80 mmHg to reduce cardiovascular and renal risk.
Adopt dietary changes, increase physical activity, and reduce sodium intake to support blood pressure control.
Patient will implement and maintain a diabetes self-management plan to delay or prevent progression to type 2 diabetes.
Patient will achieve and maintain a weight loss of at least 5% of baseline body weight to improve insulin sensitivity.
Patient will maintain blood pressure below 130/80 mmHg to reduce cardiovascular risk.
